name: Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks!
description:
Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks! is a sports-arcade game developed by Level 5. It was originally released in 2014. Nintendo published the game. On review aggregator Metacritic, Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks! has a score of 70. Most rawgers rated the game as "Exceptional".
Inazuma Eleven 3: Team Ogre Attacks! is available on Nintendo 3DS and Nintendo DS.
Akihiro Hino produced the game. Takehiro Fujii directed the game. Natsumi Kameoka and Yasunori Mitsuda scored the game.
